text: Piotr Bikont (12 May 1955 – 27 June 2017) was a Polish journalist, publicist, culinary critic and a theatre director. Frames of Remembrance: The Dynamics of Collective Memory By Iwona Irwin Zarecka Video Shooter: Storytelling with DV, HD and HDV Cameras By Barry Braverman The New Yorker, F-R Publishing Corporation, 1992 He was born in Łódź, Poland. Bikont translated Art Spiegelman's "Maus" to Polish. He was a member of editorial staff of the talking magazine Gadający Pies based in Kraków. He was the author of a book Jewish Cooking According to Balbina Przepiórko. Bikont died on 27 June 2017 in a car accident near Warsaw, aged 62.Piotr Bikont, dziennikarz i krytyk kulinarny, nie żyje ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Polish journalists Category:Food and drink critics Category:Writers from Łódź
